replyContent:
The feature to switch profiles in the NHS App to act on behalf of another person, such as a child or dependant, is currently available at GP surgeries that use either the SystmOne (TPP) or Patient Access (EMIS) systems.
Access is controlled by the GP. You can ask them to register you for proxy access. They will guide you through registration.
